verses.verse: For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>cometh,<s%> that shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> as an <S%H8574>oven;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2086>proud,<s%> yea, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7564>wickedly,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7179>stubble:<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>cometh<s%> shall burn them <S%H3857>up,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> it shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8328>root<s%> nor <S%H6057>branch.<s%>

And ye shall tread <S%H6072>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H665>ashes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> ye the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I commanded <S%H6680>unto<s%> him in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with a <S%H2764>curse.<s%>
